All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary 
    Class Description
    Aggressive
    This class is used for aggressive computer player strategy that focuses on attack (reinforces its strongest country, then always attack with it until it cannot attack anymore, then fortifies in order to maximize aggregation of forces in one country).
    Benevolent
    This class is used for benevolent computer player strategy that focuses on protecting its weak countries (reinforces its weakest countries, never attacks, then fortifies in order to move armies to weaker countries).
    BoardView
    This class implements the Risk game view designed in GUI.
    Card
    The Enum Card.
    CardView
    This class is used to chose the cards by the player during the Reinforcement phase of the game to obtain new armies.
    Cheater
    This class is used for cheater computer player strategy whose reinforce() method doubles the number of armies on all its countries, whose attack() method automatically conquers all the neighbors of all its countries, and whose fortify() method doubles the number of armies on its countries that have neighbors that belong to other players.
    Colors
    This class adds colors in game.
    Continent
    This is a main class to read and store different elements of the continent.
    ContinentTest
    Test class for Continent class that checks the values for the continent.
    Country
    This is a main class to read and store different elements of the country.
    CountryTest
    This test case tested the country class functions.
    CountryViewModel
    An object model for country with payers information and number of armies belongs to one country for creating a view.
    CountryViewModelTest
    Test class that tests the methods in CountryViewModel class in model package.
    FinishView
    This class is used to display the Congratulation message to the player who wins the game.
    Game
    Game model contains the class to create a model for the game.
    GameController
    Game Controller initializes the game by calling the game model.
    GameControllerTest
    This is the test class for game controller.
    GameMode
    This class is used to select Game mode when starting to play the game.
    GamePhase
    This enum is containing the phases name of the game.
    GameTest
    This test Class deals with the game model class.
    Human
    This class is used for human player that requires user interaction to make decisions.
    InitialPlayerArmy
    This class sets the number of armies for every players
    JTableRowNameDominationView
    This class is used to create the static rows with the element name in the world domination view.
    MainController
    This is a main class to run the game.
    MapController
    This class is used to handle the operations to generate, edit the map.
    MapControllerTest
    This file test the test cases for the map controller class.
    MapModel
    This Class is to read and Validate the created or existing Map file according to the requirement.
    MapModelTest
    The Class MapModelTest.
    MapView
    This class is used to create a map.
    Player
    this is a player class which contains the players attributes and basic setter getter functions to get and set the value out of it.
    PlayerStrategy
    This class is used for the declaration of the reinforce, attack and fortify methods.
    PlayerTest
    Test class that tests the correctness in values in Player class that'll be used in further operations .
    PrintConsoleAndUserInput
    This class is used to take the input from from the console.
    Random
    This class is used for A random computer player strategy that reinforces random a random country, attacks a random number of times a random country, and fortifies a random country, all following the standard rules for each phase.
    RandomNumber
    This class generates a random number to be used for the Random Strategy
    TestSuite
    The Class TestSuite.
    TournamentModeResultView  
    WorldDominationView
    This class shows the updated view of the Players world domination which includes (1) The percentage of the map controlled by every player (2) The continents controlled by every player (3) The total number of armies owned by every player.
